name: coldwarm-ng
description: HTML5 implementation of coldwarm photoshop plugin

scripts.copy: npm run copy:html && npm run copy:libs && npm run copy:manifest
scripts.copy:manifest: mkdirp build/CSXS && hbsutil -s -v -e -d build/CSXS -f package.json src/CSXS/manifest.xml.hbs
scripts.scss:dev: mkdirp build/css && node-sass --source-map-contents --source-map-embed --source-comments --include-path src/scss -o build/css src/scss/style.scss
scripts.scss: mkdirp build/css && node-sass -x  --include-path src/scss --output-style compressed -o build/css src/scss/style.scss
scripts.build:dev: touch .debug && cp .debug build/.debug && babel -s inline -d build/js src/js
scripts.build:debug: npm run build:dev && babel -s inline -w --skip-initial-build -d build/js src/js
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run copy && npm run scss:dev && npm run build:dev
scripts.debug: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run copy && npm run scss:dev && npm run build:debug
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run copy && npm run scss && npm run build
